fields.description:

When creating the "/var/log/storm/metadata" directory manually, everything works fine. Apparently, lines 599-601 in "supervisor.clj" seem to be the culprit, which create the metadata directory only if the  "supervisor.run.worker.as.user" flag is disabled:

(when (and (not (conf SUPERVISOR-RUN-WORKER-AS-USER))
              (not (.exists (.getParentFile file))))
     (.mkdirs (.getParentFile file)))
